Get a taste of what your career could be at kraftheinzcompany.com/careers.Job DescriptionRole / Title This is a Research and Development (R&D;) Packaging technical role leading and executing projects across our North American Refrigerated business. The candidate will be leading/executing packaging technical projects to meet business initiatives focused on growth/innovation, brand maintenance and quality improvement. This includes leading plant and lab based tests, detailed documentation of data, analyzing the data and building a viable path forward, communicating results to cross functional teams to gain alignment, and commercializing products. Communication and teamwork skills are essential in this role, which operates in a dynamic and cross-functional environment. The candidate must also be driven by a curiosity to build on a technical background and apply learnings / scientific principles to new situations. This position requires an individual to manage multiple projects concurrently with moderate levels of supervisor guidance. Exhibiting a collaborative mindset and applying innovative solutions are a must.
